QuestData.Title: Tweedle's Dumb
QuestData.Description: Delays, delays, delays! I'm at wit's end!$b$bI was told that this goblin was brilliant - that he'd come up with gadgets sure to shock the enemy into submission. So far he's produced nothing but empty promises. If he comes up empty-handed again, I'm going to toss him off the cliff!$b$bYou go and speak to him, $c. Let him know that my fuse is running short!
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Goggath wants you to speak with Tweedle at Hellscream's Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: Let me tell ya somethin' $c!$b$bThe bossman simply doesn't appreciate the art and craftsmanship that goes into making fine explosives.
